mapper.sql: SELECT idx AS banner_idx ,title AS title ,view_type AS view_type ,sex AS sex ,frequency_rate AS frequency_rate ,term_type AS term_type ,start_datetime AS start_datetime ,end_datetime AS end_datetime ,is_pop AS is_pop ,is_view AS is_view ,position AS position ,pc_img_url AS pc_img_url ,pc_link_url AS pc_link_url ,mobile_img_url AS mobile_img_url ,mobile_link_url AS mobile_link_url ,thumb_img_url AS thumb_img_url ,platform AS platform ,popup_type AS popup_type ,is_cookie AS is_cookie ,contents AS contents ,is_title_view AS is_title_view ,is_button_view AS is_button_view ,`desc` AS `desc` ,reg_date AS reg_date ,DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS reg_dateFormat ,op_name AS opName ,last_upd_date AS lastUpdDate ,DATE_FORMAT(last_upd_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS lastUpdDateFormat ,last_op_name AS lastOpName ,`order` AS `order` ,ios_judge_view_on AS iosJudgeViewOn ,day_of_the_week AS dayOfTheWeek ,week_time_type AS content_scheduleWeekTime ,week_start_datetime AS weekStartDatetime ,week_end_datetime AS weekEndDatetime FROM rd_admin.tb_admin_banner

if.test: is_view != null and is_view != "" and is_view != "-1"
position != null and position != "" and position != "-1"

mapper.select: /* Con_BannerDao.xml - callContentsBannerListCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rd_admin.tb_admin_banner
mapper.update: /* Con_BannerDao.xml - callContentsBannerEdit */ UPDATE rd_admin.tb_admin_banner SET title = IFNULL(#{title}, title) ,view_type = IFNULL(#{view_type}, view_type) ,sex = IFNULL(#{sex}, sex) ,frequency_rate = IFNULL(#{frequency_rate}, frequency_rate) ,term_type = IFNULL(#{term_type}, term_type) ,start_datetime = IFNULL(STR_TO_DATE(#{start_datetime},'%Y%m%d %H%i%S'), start_datetime) ,end_datetime = IFNULL(STR_TO_DATE(#{end_datetime},'%Y%m%d %H%i%S'), end_datetime) ,is_pop = IFNULL(#{is_pop}, is_pop) ,is_view = IFNULL(#{is_view}, is_view) ,`position` = IFNULL(#{position}, `position`) ,pc_img_url = IFNULL(#{pc_img_url}, pc_img_url) ,pc_link_url = IFNULL(#{pc_link_url}, pc_link_url) ,mobile_img_url = IFNULL(#{mobile_img_url}, mobile_img_url) ,mobile_link_url = IFNULL(#{mobile_link_url}, mobile_link_url) ,thumb_img_url = IFNULL(#{thumb_img_url}, thumb_img_url) ,platform = IFNULL(#{platform}, platform) ,popup_type = IFNULL(#{popup_type}, popup_type) ,is_cookie = IFNULL(#{is_cookie}, is_cookie) ,contents = IFNULL(#{contents}, contents) ,is_title_view = IFNULL(#{is_title_view}, is_title_view) ,is_button_view = IFNULL(#{is_button_view}, is_button_view) ,`desc` = IFNULL(#{desc}, `desc`) ,ios_judge_view_on = IFNULL(#{iosJudgeViewOn}, ios_judge_view_on) ,last_upd_date = NOW() ,last_op_name = #{opName} ,day_of_the_week = #{dayOfTheWeek} ,week_time_type = #{content_scheduleWeekTime} ,week_start_datetime = concat(#{weekStartDatetime},'00') ,week_end_datetime = concat(#{weekEndDatetime},'00') WHERE idx = #{banner_idx}
mapper.delete: /* Con_BannerDao.xml - callContentsBannerDelete */ DELETE FROM rd_admin.tb_admin_banner WHERE idx = #{banner_idx}
mapper.select: select * from( (select count(*) on_cnt from rd_admin.tb_admin_banner where is_view = 1) as on_cnt , (select count(*) off_cnt from rd_admin.tb_admin_banner where is_view = 0) as off_cnt , (select count(*) pc_cnt from rd_admin.tb_admin_banner where is_view = 1 and platform like '1%') as pc_cnt , (select count(*) aos_cnt from rd_admin.tb_admin_banner where is_view = 1 and (platform like '01%' or platform like '11%')) as aos_cnt , (select count(*) ios_cnt from rd_admin.tb_admin_banner where is_view = 1 and platform like '%1') as ios_cnt , (select count(*) mainTop_cnt from rd_admin.tb_admin_banner where is_view = 1 and position = 1) as mainTop_cnt , (select count(*) mainCenter_cnt from rd_admin.tb_admin_banner where is_view = 1 and position = 9) as mainCenter_cnt , (select count(*) clipCenter_cnt from rd_admin.tb_admin_banner where is_view = 1 and position = 10) as clipCenter_cnt , (select count(*) gnb_cnt from rd_admin.tb_admin_banner where is_view = 1 and position = 0) as gnb_cnt , (select count(*) start_cnt from rd_admin.tb_admin_banner where is_view = 1 and position = 7) as start_cnt , (select count(*) end_cnt from rd_admin.tb_admin_banner where is_view = 1 and position = 8) as end_cnt , (select count(*) image_cnt from rd_admin.tb_admin_banner where is_view = 1 and position = 6 and popup_type = 0) as image_cnt , (select count(*) text_cnt from rd_admin.tb_admin_banner where is_view = 1 and position = 6 and popup_type = 1) as text_cnt )
